Header: Hospitalized Horowpathana OIC’s wife passes away
Content: Horowpathana OIC’s wife who was hospitalized with severe stab injuries has passed away last night. She and her daughter were stabbed by the son-in-law on 25 th . The daughter succumbed to her injuries initially. They were rushed to the Anuradhapura hospital following the incident. Husband of the deceased daughter was remanded in connection to the case.
